Definition.WordDefinition: microwave n 1: a short electromagnetic wave (longer than infrared but shorter than radio waves); used for radar and microwave ovens and for transmitting telephone, facsimile, video and data 2: kitchen appliance that cooks food by passing an electromagnetic wave through it; heat is produced by the absorption of microwave energy by the water molecules in the food [syn: {microwave oven}] v : cook or heat in a microwave oven; "You can microwave the left-overs" [syn: {micro-cook}, {zap}, {nuke}]
